text: Marija Maraš (born 23 September 2002) is a Montenegrin footballer who plays as a defender for 1. ŽFL club ŽFK Breznica and the Montenegro women's national team. ==References== Category:2002 births Category:Living people Category:Women's association football defenders Category:Montenegrin women's footballers Category:Montenegro women's international footballers Category:ŽFK Breznica players
title: Marija Maraš
